user_query: I want to surprise my family with a home-cooked dinner. Can you suggest some delicious recipes for a main course and dessert? It would also be helpful to know the calorie count for each recipe to ensure a balanced meal.

TaskList.description: Search for main course recipes that are suitable for family dinner.
Search for dessert recipes that pair well with the selected main course.
Calculate the calorie count for each suggested main course recipe.
Calculate the calorie count for each suggested dessert recipe.
Compile a list of the selected main course and dessert recipes along with their calorie counts.
